links.description: GAAP earnings per diluted share (EPS) of $0.97 compared to $1.19 in the third quarter of 2019. Excluding Special Items, EPS of $1.05 compared to $1.40 in the third quarter of 2019. links.description: Get notified next time CR.US makes a similar move! STAMFORD, Conn.--(BUSINESS WIRE)--Crane Co., a diversified manufacturer of highly engineered industrial products, today announced its regular quarterly dividend of $0.43 per share for the fourth quarter of 2020. The dividend is payable on December 9, 2020 to shareholders of record as of the close of business on November 30, 2020.
